extension.name: Freemason User
extension.author: Savvy Panda
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3 or later
extension.description: Coordinates user registration and login with the Indiana Freemasons database

field.name: autoregister
field.description: Automatically create Registered Users where possible
field.label: Auto-create Users

field.name: mail_to_user
field.label: Notification Mail to User
field.description: When an administrator creates a user account, this determines if an email containing their username and password is sent to the user.

field.name: remote_db_address
field.description: Location of the remote database server
field.label: Remote Database Address

field.name: remote_db_port
field.description: Port to connect to on the remote database server
field.label: Remote Database Port

field.name: remote_db_database
field.description: Name of the database on the remote server
field.label: Remove Database Name

field.name: remote_db_procedure
field.description: Stored Procedure to run in the remote database
field.label: Remote Database Procedure

field.name: notification_email
field.description: Email address to send connection error notifications to
field.label: Notification Email
